Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington. Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington. Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas. Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None

Project Mercy, None, projmercy@aol.com, Seattle WA, 981, Steve KingA non profit, 501(c)(3), humanitarian organization founded in 1992 in Seattle, Washington.  Project Mercy focuses on bringing aid to orphaned and abandoned children in Vietnam.  Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas. Currently, Project Mercy cares for 156 children in a network of supervised foster care homes in the Da Nang, Hoi An, Kontum, and Phu Bon areas.  Long term project goals include construction and operation of a resident orphanage facility and children's medical clinic in the Central Highlands of Vietnam., None
